channel.title: Uploading An Animation
channel.description: Okay, I use Photobucket and I am having trouble Uploading this file. It has no .psd file Uploading thingy and whenever I do the Save Animation as a File thingy it makes each frame a seperate file so that I can't put the animation on a page where it actually works. How do I upload this and put it on a page/forum? Thanks!

item.title: Uploading An Animation
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Just a testy… lol

Read full topic

item.title: Uploading An Animation
item.dc:creator: @hodunken hodunken
item.description:
@hodunken wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:3, topic:89245”]
Thanks for the suggestion but I got it to work by opening it into a webpage then using the ‘Save Picture As’ thingy. Then Uploading.[/quote]
whatever works, works lol.
what are you going to make with that animation?

Read full topic

item.title: Uploading An Animation
item.dc:creator: @hodunken hodunken
item.description:
@hodunken wrote:

Slave Scyth:

Okay, I use Photobucket and I am having trouble Uploading this file. It has no .psd file Uploading thingy and whenever I do the Save Animation as a File thingy it makes each frame a seperate file so that I can’t put the animation on a page where it actually works. How do I upload this and put it on a page/forum? Thanks!

go back and save the file as a .gif file. not .psd. then you will be able to upload it

Read full topic
